params._amount: The amount of METRIC to lock
params._withdrawer: The address of the user locking the METRIC

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._newCostController: The new address of the ActionCostController.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

lockMetric(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Locks METRIC for creating a question

setCostController(address).notice: Sets the address of the ActionCostController.

slashMetric(uint256).notice: Allows onlyOwner to slash a question -- halfing the METRIC locked for the question.

withdrawMetric(uint256).notice: Allows a user to withdraw METRIC locked for a question, after the question is published.
